posts.message:
[Javascript]: Don't miss that playlist below, Mattias Petter(Front-end developer at Spotify) is talking about Functional programming in JavaScript.

Link: https://goo.gl/x2SM1P

Hi there , 
I am a senior PHP Developer with 8 yrs Exp.

i was called three days ago for a job interview i did not apply for (they get my resume from some website)

i was asked if i used joomla before and if i write code documentation  .

I told the interviewer that i did not do any previous work with joomla as i always build Platforms and big systems from scratch and Most of the Joomla Bootstapping Core is an added load i do not need specially with big traffic sites ,

the second question about documentation , i said i never wrote documentation because i was never asked to , but if i would be asked , i can do this as it is a very easy job but a time consuming. 

when the interview came to the part where i should show him my code and my previous work , he was on a hurry an he just said i will call you .

i really do not know why such people - calling themselves multi national companies - are not estimating the value of our time .. we prepared .. came in time .. postponed our duties .. why ? he could have asked by phone if i used joomla or made documentation before !!

I do not think that all PHP programmers in FACEBOOK co. or Google inc. used joomla or Done the Documentation part before .

what do you think ?

posts.description:
نرجع كدا ليوم الحد اللي فات  :3  
فاكرين اتكلمنا ع ايه ؟ 
طيب جبنا سيرة ايه :3 ؟
اللي مش فاكر يجي هنا اللينك اهو  :) :
https://www.facebook.com/Simprex.AB3D/posts/135521133450019 
بس النهارده هنتمعن و ندخل شويه ف دخانينها 8-) ،
( مبدأياً كدا ال 3D printer بتختلف عن ال printer العاديه ب 180 درجه ،
العاديه دي بتطلع ورق و قماش  ... ال 3D printer بتطلع قماش و ورق  :D  )

* 5 جد شويه *

ال 3D printer بتعمل نماذج صلبه ثلاثيه الابعاد لل design اللي بندخلها عن طريق برامج الكمبيوتر الخاصه بال design زي برامج الكاد (CAD drawing  ) و عشان تعمل الطابعه design المطلوب لازم يكون ف عمليات مسؤوله انها ترسّيب الماده المُستخدمه ع شكل طبقات لصناعه  design المطلوب منها ،

نيجي ندخل اكتر شويه ف الموضوع :

الالة بتقرأ ال design اللي دخلناه عن طريق الكمبيوتر و بتحوله لمجموعات من الطبقات اللي بتترسب واحده ورا واحده من السائل او المسحوق من الماده اللي بنستخدمها ف الطابعه ، و ال designer بيختار السُمك بتاع الطبقه اللي هيتم ترسيبها ف البرنامج ،
عشان الالة تفهم ال design اللي دخلها من برنامج الكاد بيبقى ف ملف ف البررنامج بيلعب دور الوسيط بين ال design و برنامج الكاد و اسمه STL file format ، و الملف ده بيبقى فيه شكل تقريبي لل design و شكل الطبقات اللي هتتجمع مع بعض عشان توصل للشكل النهائي design ،
معلومه ع الماشي ( كُل ما كان عدد الطبقات اكتر كل ما كان شكل النموذج ادق )
الطابعه دي تختلف عن الطابعه العاديه ف الوقت كمان :3 ، عشان ال 3D printer بتاخد من ساعات لايام ف انها تطلع النموذج النهائي بس ده بيعتمد ع حجم ال design و نوع الالة و حسب التكنولوجيا المستخدمه فيها .

posts.message:
Dears 

I have two applications one is written in Java and the other is written in Scala. 

The java application is using the Scala application as a library. When I build the java application against JDK 1.8 every thing works fine. 

When the I build the application against JDK 1.7, the application throw the following exception.

java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: scala/collection/Seq : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0

It seems that the Scala application is compatible with JDK 1.8 only. 
I tried to change the project compiler settings in the Scala project and set the target JVM into version 1.7 but nothing changed. 

Any suggestions to have the application run against JDK 1.7 ?
Maher Mohamed Gamal Ahmed Abdurrahman Mahmoud Rabie

Hey geeks, I have a question..

If I've developed some project to someone and he asked me for the source code of this project, do I have the right to say no?

And what about this scenario in enterprise-to-enterprise situation?

If you already know how to touch-type, but you would like to gain a bit more speed, I think a good resource to do so is:
http://play.typeracer.com/

It's a platform where you can compete with others and practice your touch typing skills.
